sentences.en: Almost anything that impairs liver function can cause hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 任何有损于肝功能的因素,几乎都会引起肝炎.

sentences.en: As a major health risk hepatitis is second only to tobacco.
sentences.cn: 肝炎是仅次于吸烟的主要健康隐患。

sentences.en: Hepatitis is transmitted by blood transfusion.
If the nails are mostly white with darker rims, this can indicate liver problems, such as hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 如果指甲有大片的白色和深色的边缘，这可能预示着肝脏问题，例如肝炎。

sentences.en: In the early 1960 s, hepatitis research was stalled.
sentences.cn: 六十年代初, 对肝炎的研究曾一度毫无进展.

sentences.en: Intravenous drug users are in a high - risk category for hepatitis C.
sentences.cn: 静脉注射毒品的人是患丙型肝炎的高危人.

sentences.en: It is said that the plant can be used to treat hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 据说那种植物可用来治肝炎.

sentences.en: Liver cancer is linked to the hepatitis B virus.
sentences.cn: 肝癌与乙肝病毒存在关联。

sentences.en: Long - term overuse of alcohol, for example, can cause alcoholic hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 例如, 长期 嗜酒会引起酒精性肝炎.

sentences.en: Scientists may soon be able to offer hepatitis A protection.
sentences.cn: 科学家们可能很快就能提出预防甲型肝炎的方法.

sentences.en: Some hepatitis B victims can have further problems.
sentences.cn: 有些乙型肝炎患者可能会遇到进一步的问题.

sentences.en: The public health bureau moved to curb hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 卫生局采取措施控制肝炎.

sentences.en: The tests for hepatitis were negative.
We should require that every student is immunized against hepatitis B.
sentences.cn: 我们应要求每个学生都注射乙肝疫苗。

sentences.en: What appearance is the symptom of hepatitis?
sentences.cn: 肝炎的症状是什么样子的？

sentences.en: WHO will work in close collaboration with all our partners to prevent and control viral hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 世卫组织将与所有合作伙伴紧密合作，预防和控制病毒性肝炎。

trans.tran_en: Hepatitis is a serious disease which affects the liver
